definition: weight/number/code/to pile/to stack/classifier for length or distance (yard), happenings etc
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China

sentences.english: Study of Vector Quantization Fast Codeword Search Algorithms;
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种矢量量化快速码字搜索算法。

sentences.english: Farming tillage seeding, leisure reading code.
sentences.chinese: 农时耕田播种，闲时读书码字。

sentences.english: In this theory, all codewords in codebook are rotated to four hieratical directions to check their correlations.
sentences.chinese: 提出了将码书中的码字旋转压缩的理论。

sentences.english: The other advantage of QRSVLC is that each codeword of QRSVLC contains a sync codeword.
sentences.chinese: 它还具有每个码字都包含同步字等优点。

definition: first of the five night watch periods 19:00-21:00 (old)
lit. to gnaw a book/to study/to cram
(oral) to write (esp. for a living)/to spell out laboriously on squared paper
person who writes articles - newspapers, magazines, blogs (informal)/scribe/copyist/a talented writer of articles or of calligraphy
to reward/to tip/to give a gratuity
to watch a TV series etc regularly/to binge-watch
to stay up late or all night
